amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Payments in Lieu of Taxes (PILT) program by $12 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to decrease funding for management of the Department of the Interior by $13,000,000 and to increase funding to implement the Act of October 20, 2976, as amended (31 U.S.C. 6901-6907) by $12,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cubin amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
